item.title: Mentioned by Huffington Post Canada
item.description:
Shea's Shaming Of Liberals Over Marijuana An Attack From PMO, MPs Say
On Monday morning, Shea released a statement slamming Charlottetown MP Sean Casey, Malpeque MP Wayne Easter and Cardigan MP Lawrence MacAulay for endorsing their leader Justin Trudeau's "reckless position" on pot legalization. Read the whole ...

item.title: Mentioned by Macleans.ca
item.description:
Mike Duffy and Nigel Wright: Still more questions
Liberal MP Sean Casey says Mike Duffy should resign and Mr. Casey likely came to that conclusion before he was aware that Mr. Duffy's Senate expense claims seem to overlap with time he spent campaigning for the Conservatives in the last election.
